# Playing

```{r}
wbcd <- read.csv("wisc_bc_data.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
wbcd <- wbcd[,-1]

normalize <- function(x) {
  return ((x - min(x)) / (max(x) - min(x)))
}

wbcd_n <- as.data.frame(lapply(wbcd[,2:31], normalize))
```
